Hero01.Name: Rekka Knuckletusk
Hero01.DescOnJoin: who broke the Bane of Marrow Mountain barehanded
Hero01.DescOnDepart: who humbled the masters of the marred ocean aboard their own ships
Hero01.Special1Bark: I can take all of you!
Hero01.Special2Bark: You'll have to do better than that...
Hero01.RunAwayBark: You can take 'em! I'll find you!
Hero01.JoinBark: Need some help? You won't do better than ol' Rekka.
Hero01.AbandonedBark: ...I guess you're right. Go then. Maybe we'll meet again.

Hero02.Name: Jarzoka
Hero02.DescOnJoin: who slew nine and thirty and one hundred at the Battle of Dire Bend
Hero02.DescOnDepart: who forged his blades in the molten lungs of Grome
Hero02.Special1Bark: I'll halve the lot of you...
Hero02.JoinBark: More strangers? Join me. We can escape this place, and seek our revenge together!
Hero02.AbandonedBark: Leaving? Go on then. I can still fight. I'll gather your bones where I find them.
Hero02.DeathBark: Ungh... that one's... past the armor...

Hero03.Name: Dame Lizen of Holg
Hero03.DescOnJoin: who raised her shield, heavy with arrows, to thwart the moon itself
Hero03.DescOnDepart: who bent her knee to the mother of peering witches, knowing she would suffer for it
Hero03.JoinBark: Dame Lizen of Holg, at your service. Perhaps we might join forces? At least until we are free of this place.
Hero03.AbandonedBark: Go on. You'll be fine without me. I'll hold this passage for as long as I can.
Hero03.DeathBark: This is it! All I have left!

Hero04.Name: Mad-Wolf Carster
Hero04.DescOnJoin: who howled and brought fear to the bones of the world
Hero04.DescOnDepart: who tore the throat from his father's warband, and the hand from his brother's arm
Hero04.JoinBark: Well, how do you like this? My own compatriots didn't make it far. Maybe we can do better together?
Hero04.AbandonedBark: Cowards! You'd better hope I die here. I'll come for you!

Hero05.Name: Ashkel Astar
Hero05.DescOnJoin: who marked and measured the hidden skies
Hero05.DescOnDepart: who gave her daughter to the sun, and raised two more from the ocean
Hero05.Special1Bark: Burn, as the stars of old!
Hero05.Special2Bark: There is only night, frigid and starless...
Hero05.JoinBark: It is not ordained that we should die here. Not all of us...
Hero05.AbandonedBark: I see. So this is my fate. But I wonder, what will become of you?
Hero05.DeathBark: Go! You must reach the end without me!

Hero06.Name: Luna Manticrest
Hero06.DescOnJoin: who wrote her will upon the heart of the heart of the entangled king
Hero06.DescOnDepart: who learned each song in the Grimoire of Damning Promises by heart
Hero06.Special1Bark: I will make of thee ash.
Hero06.Special2Bark: Mine is the fury of winter!
Hero06.RunAwayBark: Look not to me! This fight is yours!
Hero06.JoinBark: We are all ill-fortuned, no? Certainly 'tis better to ally?
Hero06.AbandonedBark: I will not be put aside so brusquely. Pray that your paths do not cross mine ever again.
Hero06.DeathBark: This I give... and nothing more.

Hero07.Name: Zyra the Fool
Hero07.DescOnJoin: who has seen a hundred worlds and understood none
Hero07.DescOnDepart: who gave his mortal tongue so he might curse his gods in their own language
Hero07.JoinBark: (A masked figure meets you with a silent nod. He will join you, if you will have him.)
Hero07.AbandonedBark: (Zyra is silent. You feel a sense of resignation, and of fear.)
Hero07.DeathBark: GED... GED... GED... GED... GED... GED... GED... GED...

Hero08.Name: Hans Undreth
Hero08.DescOnJoin: who spoke the words that felled the tower
Hero08.DescOnDepart: who made a gesture and turned the tide
Hero08.JoinBark: I am Hans Undreth. Perhaps you know the stories? Perhaps I have a legend or two left in store...
Hero08.AbandonedBark: I understand. All I once was... reduced to this. Shameful. Leave me. Please...

Hero09.Name: Marle Mantether
Hero09.DescOnJoin: who plundered the belly of a dying drake
Hero09.DescOnDepart: who carved his dice from the fingerbones of trolls
Hero09.RunAwayBark: Nope, sorry. I'll get the next one.
Hero09.JoinBark: The name's Marle. Looks like we're headin' the same way. Mind if I tag along?
Hero09.AbandonedBark: That's how it is? Ye won't make it far without me.

Hero10.Name: Vho Lo'ka
Hero10.DescOnJoin: who bound death to life with threads of gold
Hero10.DescOnDepart: who etched her name in the vault of secret vows
Hero10.JoinBark: You on your way out? Smart. Escape's the only thing of value here.
Hero10.AbandonedBark: What? No! You can't leave me! Not like this!
Hero10.DeathBark: Oh... oh no... not like this...

Hero11.Name: Vinsomen Hordry
Hero11.DescOnJoin: who blotted his name in the ledgers of death, and lives yet wrongly
Hero11.DescOnDepart: who the lightning dared not strike, who by the wind would not be whipped
Hero11.Special2Bark: This makes for an ugly death...
Hero11.JoinBark: Vinsomen Hordry's the name. I can't tell you where we are, but when it comes to cheating death, I'm an old hand. Shall we?
Hero11.AbandonedBark: Me? Go? Just like that? Fine, I suppose. Perhaps there are others in need of rescue here. At least one, I'm certain.

Hero12.Name: Unlucky Yarko
Hero12.DescOnJoin: who stalked and slew the yellow magisters, and hears their whispers still
Hero12.DescOnDepart: who dreamt of common things, and saw his fantasies in wreaths of smoke
Hero12.Special1Bark: Oh my. Where shall we go?
Hero12.Special2Bark: Mine is the fang! Mine the venom!
Hero12.JoinBark: Yarko. I'm Yarko? Are you leaving? I'll go with you. I'm very handy, very sneaky.
Hero12.AbandonedBark: What? No. Don't leave me. I know things! I hear things. You can't go. You can't leave me!
